Parameter.Label: Sensor Binary Report
Parameter.Help: Toggle the sensor binary report value when the Magnet switch is opened /closed.

Parameter.Label: Wake up
Parameter.Help: Enable wake up 10 minutes when the power is switched on.

Parameter.Label: Basic set value
Parameter.Help: Toggle the basic set value when the Magnet switch is opened /closed.

Parameter.Label: Reports that will be sent
Parameter.Help:
0 - Batttery: determines whether the Water Sensor sends the battery Report when the probe touches the water.
1 - 3 RESERVED
4 - Sensor Binary: determines whether the Water Sensor sends the Sensor Binary Report when the probe touches the water.
5 - 7 RESERVED
8 - Basic Set: determines whether the Water Sensor sends the Basic Set Command when the probe touches the water. 9 - 11 RESERVED
12 - Alarm: determines whether the Water Sensor sends the Alarm Command when the probe touches the water.
13 -31 RESERVED
